title: Deyeek Men's Lightweight Sweatpants Open Bottom Sweat Pants for Men Straight Leg Gym Sweatpants Lounge Pants with Pockets
description: 【Cozy Material】Loose-fit sweatpants are made of soft and non-itchy fabric that feels really comfy on the skin. Skin-friendly and lightweight cotton blended fabric to wick moisture away from your skin, keeping you from getting damp and chilled， falling in love with a healthy lifestyle of sweating.

【Elastic Waist Drawstring】Wide leg open bottom and a relaxed fit keep you comfortable, while an elastic waistband with a drawstring maintains a secure fit. If you need nice pants which you can wear all year round, you can't go wrong with them.

【Deep Side Pockets 】The men's athletic sweatpants have two deep side pockets that are really handy and are deep enough to put a phone, card, key, wallet, etc. in, so you can keep your phone or other valuables safe and secure during your workouts or exercises.

【Durable & Easy to Care】Extremely durable and long-lasting, wrinkle-resistant, difficult to pilling, and easy to clean, it keeps you comfortable whether in casual or athletic style. Please check our size chart picture on the left carefully.

【Suitable Occasion】Versatile pair of sweatpants that go great for all occasions. These men's open-bottom athletic pants with loose fit design meet different lounge, athletic, home, and daily wear needs. Go for a run, hit the gym, or enjoy your favorite yoga class with our awesome pants.
